tool.name: Binary strings from fasta
tool.help:
CALL sh binary_strings.sh input.fasta dinucleotides output.file
INPUT input.fasta - input fasta file dinucleotides - 'AA AC AG AT ...'
OUTPUT output.file - name of tabular format output file
DESCRIPTION Convert fasta sequences to a binary sequence of 01 in which 1(ones) indicate a presence of a given dinucleotide at that position and 0 everywhere else. Each fasta sequence in the input file has a corresponding row with four tab separated columns: binary_string dinucleotide fasta_string times_occurred
REQUIREMENT install dnp-binstrings conda install -c bioconda dnp-binstrings
